Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skornia:
I’m delighted to hear about the
new consultation service. Won’t you ask Mr. Novik
to plan, very early next Fall, to cross the river
and allow us to avail ourselves of his services?
He could help us evaluate our recent survey;
advise us about television etc., etc.
Marie C. 5canlon
Supervisor of Radio and Television
